level.text: 743.1 This section applies to any person who, on or after January 1, 2012,upplies, sells, offers for sale, manufactures for sale, or uses or appliesdhesives, sealants, or adhesive or sealant primers, except as provided in §45.

743.2 For purposes of §§ 743 through 749 and of any definitions in §799pplicable to §§ 743 through 749, the District incorporates by reference rulesnd test methods from the California Air Resource Board (CARB), the South Coastir Quality Management District (SCAQMD), and the American Society for Testingnd Materials (ASTM), where specifically cited.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 3879 (April 16, 2004); as amendedy Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 10781 (November 26, 2004); as amended byotice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 11286, 11351 (December 30, 2011).
